section.p: For better audio effects, Agora recommends setting the profile parameter of to or before using the following preset effects:

plentry.pd: Turn off audio effects and use the original voice.
The reverberation style typical of a KTV venue.
An audio effect typical of a concert hall.
An audio effect typical of a recording studio.
An audio effect typical of a vintage phonograph.

pd.p: A virtual stereo effect that renders monophonic audio as stereo audio.
pd.note: You need to set the profile parameter of to or before using this enumeration, otherwise the enumeration setting is invalid.

pd.p: A 3D voice effect that makes the voice appear to be moving around the user. After setting the sound effect, you can also call to modify the surround period.

ul.li: You need to set the profile parameter of to or before using this enumeration, otherwise the enumeration setting is invalid.
If the 3D voice effect is enabled, users need to use stereo audio playback devices to hear the anticipated voice effect.

pd.p: The reverberation style typical of an uncle's voice.
pd.note: Agora recommends using this enumerator to process a male-sounding voice; otherwise, you may not hear the anticipated voice effect.

pd.p: The voice of an old man.
pd.note: Agora recommends using this enumerator to process a male-sounding voice; otherwise, you may not hear the anticipated voice effect.
Agora recommends using this enumerator to process a male-sounding voice; otherwise, you may not hear the anticipated voice effect.

pd.p: The voice of a young woman.
pd.note: Agora recommends using this enumerator to process a female-sounding voice; otherwise, you may not hear the anticipated voice effect.
Agora recommends using this enumerator to process a female-sounding voice; otherwise, you may not hear the anticipated voice effect.

plentry.pd: The voice of Pig King, a character in Journey to the West who has a voice like a growling bear.

pd.p: An audio effect typical of R&B music.
pd.note: You need to set the profile parameter of to or before using this enumeration, otherwise the enumeration setting is invalid.

pd.p: An audio effect typical of popular music.
pd.note: You need to set the profile parameter of to or before using this enumeration, otherwise the enumeration setting is invalid.

plentry.pd: A pitch correction effect that corrects the user's pitch based on the pitch of the natural C major scale. After setting the sound effect, you can also call to adjust the basic mode of the tuning and the pitch of the main tone.
